author: ELLEN KNICKMEYER and ZEINA KARAM
title: Russian footholds in Mideast, Africa raise threat to NATO
description: BEIRUT (AP) — Russian President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine dominates world attention.
content: BEIRUT (AP) — Russian President Vladimir Putin’s invasion of Ukraine dominates world attention. But with less global scrutiny, Putin is also busy advancing Russia’s presence in the Middle East and Af… [+7754 chars]
